name: 000engineer
usage: feed engineer.py your requirements in a file, e.g., engineer.py requirements.txt

name: tester
usage: feed tester.py your python script and expect output, e.g., tester.py your_script.py OK

name: custom_tool_2
description: The engineer tool will be used to create a custom script that fetches the monthly QQQ stock price data and generates a graph saved as 'qqq_monthly.png'.
usage: Tool created by engineer: The engineer tool will be used to create a custom script that fetches the monthly QQQ stock price data and generates a graph saved as 'qqq_monthly.png'.
